item.title: Bangladesh newspaper staff recall 'gasping for air' as offices set ablaze
item.description: The fresh protests are sparked by the death of one of the leaders of protests that ousted ex-PM Sheikh Hasina.

item.title: What does TikTok's deal mean for America's users?
item.description: The BBC's Asia business correspondent says it is still unclear what sort of experience TikTok users in the US will get.

item.title: US suspends green card lottery scheme after Brown shooting
item.description: The suspect in the university shooting and the murder of an MIT professor entered the US via the scheme.

item.title: TikTok owner signs deal to avoid US ban
item.description: The deals would end years of efforts by Washington to force ByteDance to sell its US operations.

item.title: Parents in India devastated as children with thalassemia test HIV positive
item.description: The five cases in Madhya Pradesh state come weeks after a similar incident was reported in Jharkhand state.
